item.title: Longest Palindrome by Concatenating Two Letter Words
item.description: This problem was a practice problem I had encountered on Code Signal, so it cannot be found on LeetCode. The Problem Given an array of positive integers a, your task is to calculate the sum of every possible a[i] ˚ a[j], where a[i] ˚ a[j] is the concatenation of the string representations of a[i] and a[j] respectively.
